thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Cincinnati Bell Announces Changes To Its Board Of Directors

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cincinnati Bell Announces Changes To Its Board Of Directors
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - Cincinnati Bell Inc:
* CINCINNATI BELL ANNOUNCES CHANGES TO ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS
* ‍JOHN M. ZRNO WILL NOT SEEK RE-ELECTION TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS​
* SAYS CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD PHIL COX RESIGNED * COX WILL STEP DOWN FROM ROLE AS CHAIRMAN OF BOARD PRIOR TO 2019 ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS
* ‍BOARD NOMINATED PRESIDENT AND CEO, LEIGH R. FOX, TO STAND FOR ELECTION AT 2018 ANNUAL MEETING​
* ‍ AT CLOSE OF HAWAIIAN TELCOM DEAL, CO WILL EXPAND SIZE OF BOARD TO 11 MEMBERS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
